author: ansgar.eth
content: Hi all, I haven't really been involved with 1559 so far, but <@!552133098075193354> recently mentioned in a conversation with the Quilt team that there were still some open questions around transaction pool management, which is also one of the topics for tomorrow's call. So I went ahead and wrote up my thoughts on 1559 transaction sorting:

author: ansgar.eth
content: The document is still more of a draft, but with the call tomorrow I thought I'd share it anyway. tl;dr is that I think sorting is mainly important for mining (high end) and eviction (low end), and that for 1559 these will no longer have the same solution (as relative order/attractiveness of transactions is not static over time)

author: timbeiko
content: That's great, thanks for sharing <@!415548822983278593> ðŸ˜„ I've added it to the agenda
